scene-render.description: Direct render the current scene, or a new scene file if specified, to the given output file.

name: -s
--scene-file
args.description: Name of the scene file to load.

name: -o
--output-file
args.description: Path to output file to save to

rotate-render.description: Rotate and render the selected character.

args.name: object-name
args.description: Label of the object to rotate prior to rendering

args.name: lower
args.description: Starting rotation (in degrees)

args.name: upper
args.description: Ending rotation (in degrees). rotation-start must be smaller than rotation-end

args.name: slices
args.description: How many rotations between start and end to rotate. If set to zero, only render, do not rotate.

name: -o
--output-file
args.description: Absolute path to directory to render images in. Default is to generate one from the scene file name.

name: -s
--skip-render
args.description: Flag whether to render or the rotated character or not. Setting this flag skips the rendering step.

transform-copy.description: Perform translate, rotate, and/or scale operations on target node to match the transforms on the target node.

args.name: source-node
args.description: Node to translate from

args.name: target-node
args.description: Node to translate to

name: -r
--rotate
args.description: Apply the rotation transform

name: -t
--translate
args.description: Apply the translation transform

name: -s
--scale
args.description: Apply the scaling transform

name: -a
--all
args.description: Apply rotation, translation, and scaling trasforms

create-cam.description: Create a perspective camera with given name and camera type as parameters to generate the name of the camera along with the selected node label.

args.name: cam-name
args.description: Name of the camera

args.name: cam-class
args.description: Class (type) of camera

name: -f
--focus
args.description: If true, turn DOF on the new camera

create-group.description: Group the selected nodes in the scene to the name specified.

args.name: group-name
args.description: Name of the new group.

copy-camera.description: Copy the specified camera (by label) to the specified target camera, or the current viewport camera if target not specified

name: -s
--source-camera
args.description: Camera to copy from

name: -t
--target-camera
args.description: Camera to copy to (optional)

apply-pose.description: Apply the given named posed as pose file to the currently selected node or specified node

name: pose-file
args.description: Absolute path to the pose file to be applied

name: -t
--target-node
args.description: Label of the node to apply the pose to. If not specified, apply to the currently selected node.

product-list.description: List the product information for objects in the current scene

name: -t
--target-file
args.description: File to write output information to

name: -n
--node-context
args.description: If specified, present the output in the context of nodes. Otherwise the default is to present output in the context of products.

name: -s
--selected-only
args.description: Only identify products for the currently selected node.
